text:
I use cmake to generate "NMake Makefiles".
But it failed to build with below error:
H:\work\httpd-2.4.9\build\win32\httpd.rc(75) : error RC2104 : undefined keywordor key name: Apache

To fix this issue, change CMakeLists.txt line 83:
IF(MSVC_IDE)
to
IF(MSVC)

Then nmake can be supported.
creator: cliu81@gmail.com
trawick@apache.org
text:
This is fixed in httpd trunk with r1625196, and in httpd 2.4.x branch with r1625199.

Thanks for your patch; I modified it slightly to work with older cmake, which is what I was building with originally.
